nodes.bodyText: The above three lines are actually mixture of all kinds of white spaces, including ' ', '\t' and \n.

nodes.bodyText: What is the reason for parsing trailing whitespace chars?

It seems intuitive to me, though not 100% necessary for this PR. After reserving end-of-line chars, we have to remember to remove the end-of-line after last ; (which would have been skipped previously), which seems too demanding to me. It seems natural to expand \n to other white spaces.
